#### **Inventory Growth Fusion Stage 1:**

Several posterior parameter correlations are driving some potential non-identifability--namely X, X2, any interaction between a fixed effect and X, and X and mu. So, we test to see whether more simified models fix this.

1. No Site Index fixed effects
2. No Site Index fixed effect, and no X interactions
3. No Site Index fixed effects, Tree random intercept
4. No Site Index fixed effects, Tree random intercept
